title: Day 1 — DR Positioning Notes
excerpt: First day working with DR. Focused on low-stress positioning, exposure checklist, and image quality notes…
content: Focused on low-stress handling and clear positioning landmarks for thoracic DR. Practiced minimizing restraint while ensuring diagnostic value.
Kept an exposure checklist: PPE, collimation, marker placement, and lead protection. Noted common positioning pitfalls and how to fix them.

title: Reflex Scores After IP Anesthesia
excerpt: Recorded righting and pedal withdrawal reflex after IP pentobarbital. Timing helped quantify onset and recovery…
content: After IP anesthesia, I logged the disappearance and recovery of righting/pedal withdrawal reflex using a simple table.
Takeaway: consistent handling + the same assessor improves reliability of the scores.
